org.math.plot.plotObjects

Class Axis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.math.plot.plotObjects.Axis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDependant, Editable, Plotable

    public class Axis
extends java.lang.Object
implements Plotable, BaseDependant, Editable
    Class use to describe one of the axis of a plot object. BSD License

        public double[] getLegendCoord()

      • setLightLabelText

        public void setLightLabelText(java.lang.String[] _lightLabelnames)
        Sets the labels of the light lines. Is the numerical graduation by default.
        Parameters:
        _lightLabelnames - Array of string containing the labels. When the end of the array is reached for one tick, the following tick starts with the beginning of the array again.
